title: AI Verse
description: AI Verse is a multi-functional AI web application built with React.js and Tailwind CSS. It features a modern UI and integrates powerful tools like a ChatBot, Code Explainer, Text Summarizer, and Interview Prep. The app uses OpenAI's API to deliver intelligent responses and offers smooth routing, dark mode support, and interactive animations for an engaging user experience.

title: Chattyâ€“ Real-Time MERN Chat App
description: Chatty is a real-time messaging app built with the MERN stack and Socket.IO. It supports private chats, instant notifications, and Firebase Authentication. Features include typing indicators, message timestamps, and active user status. Designed with React and Tailwind CSS, it ensures a clean, responsive UI and seamless chat experience across all devices.

title: Drive with Raj (Car E-commerce Platform)
description: Drive with Raj is a premium car e-commerce platform built using React, Firebase Authentication, Firestore, and Storage. It allows users to buy, sell, and explore luxury vehicles with live data sync and a modern UI inspired by CarDekho.

title: World Galaxy
description: World Galaxy is a high-performance React photo gallery using Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion. It integrates public APIs for dynamic image loading, offers smooth animations, and delivers a fully responsive, user-friendly browsing experience.

title: QR Code Generator
description: A handy QR Code generator built with React and a public API. Users can instantly convert any link or text into a downloadable QR code with responsive styling.

title: My First Project React E-Commerce Frontend
description: A stylish React-based e-commerce frontend UI showcasing shoes and other products. Features include category browsing, dynamic routing, and a clean, modern design.
